title: Bug 49299: Servlet 3.0 ch.7.1.1 incorrectly states that custom cookie name affects URL rewriting
description: Bug 49299: Servlet 3.0 ch.7.1.1 incorrectly states that custom cookie name affects URL rewriting
OB: The Servlet 3.0 documentation in chapter 7.1.1 states that setting a custom cookie name should affect URL rewriting. However, in the current trunk version, the default cookie name 'jsessionid' is used instead.
EB: The Servlet 3.0 documentation in chapter 7.1.1 should be updated to reflect the correct behavior of the default cookie name 'jsessionid' being used for URL rewriting.
SR: To reproduce the issue: 1. Deploy the attached war file named 'cookiename.war'. 2. Access the URL 'http://localhost:8080/cookiename/'.
